para.programlisting:
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.zorba-xquery.org/simple" targetNamespace="http://www.zorba-xquery.org/simple" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="qualified">
<xs:element name="person" type="PersonType"/>
<xs:complexType name="PersonType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="age" type="xs:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType>
<xs:element name="person2" type="PersonType2"/>
<xs:complexType name="PersonType2"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="age" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>
